title: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1
body_html:
Trying to install pytorch on my pyenv python 2.7

pip install torch
Collecting torch
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/5f/e9/bac4204fe9cb1a002ec6140b47f51affda1655379fe302a1caef421f9846/torch-0.1.2.post1.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "/private/var/folders/32/4_yd4dkj6xj469sw24cmj8_w0000gn/T/pip-install-yfJzlA/torch/setup.py", line 11, in <module>
        raise RuntimeError(README)
    RuntimeError: PyTorch does not currently provide packages for PyPI (see status at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/566).

    Please follow the instructions at http://pytorch.org/ to install with miniconda instead.


    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /private/var/folders/32/4_yd4dkj6xj469sw24cmj8_w0000gn/T/pip-install-yfJzlA/torch/

Installed other libraries like numpy and pandas which worked fine.
pip list gives:

Package         Version
--------------- -------
dill            0.2.8.2
ez-setup        0.9
numpy           1.15.0
pandas          0.23.4
pip             18.0
python-dateutil 2.7.3
pytz            2018.5
setuptools      40.0.0
six             1.11.0
wheel           0.31.1

I am on macOS 10.13.5.

body:
Trying to install pytorch on my pyenv python 2.7

```
pip install torch
Collecting torch
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/5f/e9/bac4204fe9cb1a002ec6140b47f51affda1655379fe302a1caef421f9846/torch-0.1.2.post1.tar.gz
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "/private/var/folders/32/4_yd4dkj6xj469sw24cmj8_w0000gn/T/pip-install-yfJzlA/torch/setup.py", line 11, in <module>
        raise RuntimeError(README)
    RuntimeError: PyTorch does not currently provide packages for PyPI (see status at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/566).

    Please follow the instructions at http://pytorch.org/ to install with miniconda instead.


    ----------------------------------------
Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /private/var/folders/32/4_yd4dkj6xj469sw24cmj8_w0000gn/T/pip-install-yfJzlA/torch/
```

Installed other libraries like numpy and pandas which worked fine.
pip list gives:
```
Package         Version
--------------- -------
dill            0.2.8.2
ez-setup        0.9
numpy           1.15.0
pandas          0.23.4
pip             18.0
python-dateutil 2.7.3
pytz            2018.5
setuptools      40.0.0
six             1.11.0
wheel           0.31.1
```
I am on macOS 10.13.5.
